example.text: After decades of unfair trade practices, COVID, and the spy balloon, it should be clear that America needs a smart and strategic decoupling from China. Congress must shine a light on China's human rights abuses and unfair trade practices. [[url]]

Inflation isn't going away on its own. President Biden needs to sit down with Republicans to figure out a way to rein in reckless spending. Workers and small businesses need common-sense solutions to fight inflation, grow the economy, and life more Americans out of poverty. [[url]]

Before the Trump tariffs, John Romano's business had to shut down its Georgia plant from shoddy Chinese imports. After the tariffs, they were able to expand a plant in rural Mississippi. We must stand up against Chinese unfair trade practices. [[url]]

CLICK HERE to watch my full interview on Newsmax with Eric Bolling where I took Biden to task for lying to the American people about his administration's out-of-control spending. The greatest theft of taxpayer dollars in American history occurred under Biden's watch.

For too long, unfair trade practices by countries like China have exploited American job creators, workers, and farmers. [[user]] is in Staten Island to hear from Americans on the frontline of our trading relationships about how to make trade work for American workers. [[url]]

For too long, unfair trade practices by countries like China have exploited American job creators, workers, and farmers. [[user]] is in Staten Island to hear from Americans on the frontline of our trading relationships about how to make trade work for American workers. [[url]]

Good luck this season. LEGISLATIVE UPDATE H Res 1512 : National Defense Authorization Act, which authorizes pay for our military Members and the resources they need for FY2023 and blocks the Biden administration vaccine mandate for our servicemembers PASSED, REP SMITH VOTED YES S 1617 : Makes it easier for the Small Business Administration (SBA) to provide assistance to rural areas for which a major disaster was declared by the president PASSED, REP SMITH VOTED YES Washington, DC 1011 Longworth HOB Washington, DC 20515 p: (202) 225-4404 f: (202) 226-0326 Cape Girardeau 2502 Tanner Drive, Ste.
